name: firefox-launch
description: Extenision that enables the user to launch Firefox from the other browser

scripts.test: npm run lint && c8 mocha test/**/*.test.js
scripts.build: node build.js && web-ext build --source-dir build/firefox --artifacts-dir build/artifacts --overwrite-dest --filename=firefox.zip && web-ext build --source-dir build/chromium --artifacts-dir build/artifacts --overwrite-dest --filename=chromium.zip

author: mozilla
